sections.heading: Plaintiff's costs; when allowed
sections.text: Where it is not otherwise provided by this and other statutes, costs shall be allowed of course to the plaintiff, except as waived or released in writing by the plaintiff, upon a voluntary payment to the plaintiff after the action is filed but before judgment, or upon

sections.heading: common law precept. Keller v. State, 184 Neb. 853, 172 N.W.2d 782 (1969).
sections.text: common law precept. Keller v. State, 184 Neb. 853, 172 N.W.2d 782 (1969).
